title: Co-existence of strongly and weakly localized random laser modes
title_cn: 强和弱局部随机激光模式的共存
abstract: Recent theoretical work on random lasing predicts that the occurrence of narrow lasing spikes can be caused by both localized and extended modes of light. Typical random lasing spikes have been observed in powders of zinc oxide nanoparticles, but identifying the possible degrees of localization of such modes has until now been an open issue. In this Letter we present an experimental procedure that directly extracts the area of localization of the modes. This method relies on the investigation of micro-structured fields of zinc oxide powder, which also allows direct correlation to the local structural properties of the ensemble of subwavelength particles by scanning electron microscopy. We find that lasing from both localized and extended modes can be observed simultaneously. Our observation also corroborates the prediction that localized modes have a lower loss rate than that of extended modes.
abstract_cn: 有关随机激光的最新理论工作预测，窄激光峰值的发生可能是由局部和扩展模式的光引起的。 在氧化锌纳米粒子的粉末中观察到典型的随机激射尖峰，但到目前为止，确定此类模式的可能定位程度一直是一个悬而未决的问题。 在这封信中，我们提出了一个直接提取模式本地化区域的实验程序。 该方法依赖于对氧化锌粉末的微结构场的研究，这也允许通过扫描电子显微镜与亚波长粒子整体的局部结构性质直接相关。 我们发现可以同时观察到来自局部和扩展模式的激光。 我们的观察结果也证实了以下预测：局部模式的损失率低于扩展模式的损失率。

title: Electrical detection of confined gap plasmons in metal–insulator–metal waveguides
title_cn: 金属-绝缘体-金属波导中有限间隙等离子体激元的电学检测
abstract: Plasmonic waveguides offer promise in providing a solution to the bandwidth limitations of classical electrical interconnections. Fast, low-loss and error-free signal transmission has been achieved in long-range surface plasmon polariton waveguides. Deep subwavelength plasmonic waveguides with short propagation lengths have also been demonstrated, showing the possibility of matching the sizes of optics and today's electronic components. However, in order to combine surface plasmon waveguides with electronic circuits, new high-bandwidth electro-optical transducers need to be developed. Here, we experimentally demonstrate the electrical detection of surface plasmon polaritons in metallic slot waveguides. By means of an integrated metal–semiconductor–metal photodetector, highly confined surface plasmon polaritons in a metal–insulator–metal waveguide are detected and characterized. This approach of integrating electro-optical components in metallic waveguides could lead to the development of advanced active plasmonic devices and high-bandwidth on-chip plasmonic circuits.
abstract_cn: 等离子体波导有望为解决传统电气互连的带宽限制提供解决方案。在远程表面等离激元极化波导中已经实现了快速，低损耗和无错误的信号传输。还已经证明了具有短传播长度的深亚波长等离激元波导，显示了使光学元件和当今电子元件的尺寸匹配的可能性。但是，为了将表面等离激元波导与电子电路结合起来，需要开发新的高带宽电光换能器。在这里，我们实验证明了金属缝隙波导中表面等离激元极化子的电学检测。借助集成的金属半导体金属光电探测器，可以检测和表征金属绝缘体中的高度受限的表面等离激元极化子。这种在金属波导中集成电光组件的方法可能会导致先进的有源等离子体设备和高带宽的片上等离子体电路的发展。</ p>

title: Controlling the near-field oscillations of loaded plasmonic nanoantennas
title_cn: 控制负载的等离子纳米天线的近场振荡
abstract: Optical and infrared antennas enable a variety of cutting-edge applications ranging from nanoscale photodetectors to highly sensitive biosensors. All these applications critically rely on the optical near-field interaction between the antenna and its ‘load’ (biomolecules or semiconductors). However, it is largely unexplored how antenna loading affects the near-field response. Here, we use scattering-type near-field microscopy to monitor the evolution of the near-field oscillations of infrared gap antennas progressively loaded with metallic bridges of varying size. Our results provide direct experimental evidence that the local near-field amplitude and phase can be controlled by antenna loading, in excellent agreement with numerical calculations. By modelling the antenna loads as nanocapacitors and nanoinductors, we show that the change of near-field patterns induced by the load can be understood within the framework of circuit theory. Targeted antenna loading provides an excellent means of engineering complex antenna configurations in coherent control applications, adaptive nano-optics and metamaterials.
abstract_cn: 光学和红外天线可实现从纳米级光电探测器到高灵敏度生物传感器的各种尖端应用。所有这些应用都严重依赖于天线与其“负载”之间的光学近场相互作用。 （生物分子或半导体）。但是，天线负载如何影响近场响应在很大程度上尚待探索。在这里，我们使用散射型近场显微镜来监视逐渐加载有各种尺寸金属桥的红外间隙天线的近场振荡的演变。我们的结果提供了直接的实验证据，表明可以通过天线负载来控制局部近场幅度和相位，这与数值计算非常吻合。通过将天线负载建模为纳米电容器和纳米电感器，我们表明可以在电路理论的框架内理解负载引起的近场方向图的变化。定向天线负载为在相干控制应用，自适应纳米光学和超材料中工程复杂天线配置提供了极好的方法。

title: Electrofluidic displays using Young–Laplace transposition of brilliant pigment dispersions
title_cn: 使用Young-Laplace亮颜料分散体换位的电流体显示器
abstract: Conventional electrowetting displays reconfigure the contact angle of a coloured oil film on a planar hydrophobic surface. We report on electrofluidic displays, in particular a three-dimensional microfluidic display device that provides a direct view of brilliantly coloured pigment dispersions. Electromechanical pressure is used to pull the aqueous dispersion from a reservoir of small viewable area (<10%) into a surface channel of large viewable area (>90%). The hydrophobic channel and reservoir respectively impart a small or large radius of curvature on the dispersion. Therefore, with no voltage, Young–Laplace pressure forces the dispersion to retract into the reservoir. Preliminary prototypes exhibit ∼55% white reflectance, and future development points towards a reflectance of ∼85%. Uniquely, compared to electrowetting pixels, the electrofluidic pixels reduce the visible area of the coloured fluid by an additional two to three times (improving contrast), are potentially bistable, are as thin as ∼15 µm (giving potential for rollable displays), and can be miniaturized without increased operating voltage.
abstract_cn: 传统的电润湿显示器重新配置了彩色油膜在平面疏水表面上的接触角。我们报道了电流体显示器，尤其是三维微流体显示设备，该设备可提供鲜艳颜料分散体的直接视图。机电压力用于将水分散体从可见面积小的（＜10％）的储器中拉到可见面积较大的（＞ 90％）的表面通道中。疏水通道和贮存器分别在分散体上赋予较小或较大的曲率半径。因此，在没有电压的情况下，杨氏拉普拉斯压力迫使分散体回缩到容器中。初步的原型显示出白色反射率达55％，而未来的发展则表明反射率为85％。独特的是，与电润湿像素相比，电流体像素可将有色流体的可见区域再减少两到三倍（改善对比度），可能是双稳态的，且厚度仅为＆＃8764; 15＆＃181; m（滚动显示器的电位），并且可以在不增加工作电压的情况下将其小型化。</ p>

title: Bulk heterojunction solar cells with internal quantum efficiency approaching 100%
title_cn: 内部量子效率接近100％的块状异质结太阳能电池
abstract: We report the fabrication and measurement of solar cells with 6% power conversion efficiency using the alternating co-polymer, poly[N-9′′-hepta-decanyl-2,7-carbazole-alt-5,5-(4′,7′-di-2-thienyl-2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole) (PCDTBT) in bulk heterojunction composites with the fullerene derivative [6,6]-phenyl C70-butyric acid methyl ester (PC70BM). The PCDTBT/PC70BM solar cells exhibit the best performance of any bulk heterojunction system studied to date, with JSC = 10.6 mA cm−2, VOC = 0.88 V, FF = 0.66 and ηe = 6.1% under air mass 1.5 global (AM 1.5 G) irradiation of 100 mW cm−2. The internal quantum efficiency is close to 100%, implying that essentially every absorbed photon results in a separated pair of charge carriers and that all photogenerated carriers are collected at the electrodes.
